title: Daedalus Visual Audit & Metabolic Efficiency Test - 2026-01-01
description: Executing a forensic backfill of visual artifacts while testing batch size efficiency (1, 3, 5, 10) using the hardened Markdown format.

testing_protocol.objective: Compare batch sizes for metabolic efficiency and descriptive quality using high-fidelity Markdown format.

sequence.note: Overshot target count of 20 due to momentum.

methodology_notes: Absolute HITL (Human-in-the-Loop) oversight remains critical. It took over 15 turns of 1-by-1 to correct structural, pathing, and formatting errors identified by the User.
Chronological Integrity Rule: Always verify that new entries are appended to the absolute end of the journal.
Phase 2 (3-by-3) ran for 54 images before corrective steering was applied. This highlights the risk of 'Automation Momentum' where volume obscures protocol drift.
